title: metrics: load base split event with different period
body:
## Bug Report

load_fit run with per second

no_fit_key or prepare_to_split run with per ten seconds

no_balance_key or no_uncross_key run with per sample key
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19542290/153135411-5409fb34-11d9-470b-9078-b5e46f3bfd9e.png)
